RTCVideoSourceStats.summary: The RTCVideoSourceStats dictionary of the WebRTC API provides statistics information about a video track () that is attached to one or more senders ().

remarks.para: These statistics can be obtained by iterating the returned by or until you find a report with the type of media-source and a kind of video.

blockquote.para: Note: For video information about remotely sourced tracks (that are being received), see .
